query: ALTER TABLE static_site ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_chk_name_is_trimmed CHECK(name = TRIM(name)), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_fk_id_workspace_id_deleted FOREIGN KEY(id, workspace_id, deleted) REFERENCES resource(id, owner_id, deleted), ADD CONSTRAINT static_site_fk_current_live_upload FOREIGN KEY(id, current_live_upload) REFERENCES static_site_upload_history(static_site_id, upload_id);
